contentPane.p:
Go to 500 Technology Square, Cambridge (MIT Building NE47).
There is a cafe/pizzeria Area 4 on Main Street. This cafe is attached to Tech Square, but you cannot enter Tech Square from inside the cafe.
From the green quad, go inside the entrance marked "500".
Walk into the center of the building; take the elevator up.

Eric's office is NE47-379.
Take the elevator to the third floor.
There are four doors. Two lead to labs; two are glass. Facing the glass doors, go through the right glass door.
Turn right down the hallway. Eric's door is on the left, number 379.

The conference room is near the kitchen.
Take the elevator to the third floor.
There are four doors. Two lead to labs; two are glass. Facing the glass doors, go through the left glass door.
Straight ahead there is a kitchen. Go into the kitchen.
The room that's now behind you has a big sliding door. That's the conference room.
